issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
Mobile web element.js does not apply the correct cursor for items that are touchenabled. Currently just set's "auto" which would create an I-beam on text, and never create a pointer for clickable views.

Fixed in this pull request:

https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/4968
fields.summary: Mobile web does not create the correct mouse cursor for "touchEnabled" items

comments.body:
Thank you for submitting this pull request. It appears that this pull request includes multiple improvements and fixes. Please submit one pull request for one issue. We would also need a test case that we can use to validate your issue and the fix.

http://docs.appcelerator.com/titanium/latest/#!/guide/Pull_Request_Guide
Please let us know if you plan to submit a single pull request for this change.
